name: Bridges - Tin/Bag (CD)
description: Bridges - TIN/BAG 2011 MabnotesMusic (MMCD002) Kris Tiner, Trumpet Mike Baggetta, Guitar Tracks: Bobo Maslow Osho Bridges Aurobindo Govinda The Truth Inayat Khan Just Like A Woman Trumpeter Kris Tiner and Guitarist Mike Baggetta revisit their personal and sensitive approach to duo playing with ‘Bridges’ on MabnotesMusic. This album reveals their musical aesthetic clearer than any other to date and the results are beautiful and other-worldly. Funded, in part, through a grant from the American Composers Forum, ‘Bridges’ was recorded on tour at Systems Two in Brooklyn, NY and features Tiner’s ‘Transpersonal Series’ of compositions, 2 new originals contributed by Baggetta and a graceful reading of Bob Dylan’s ‘Just Like A Woman.’ To sample tracks, visit: http://www.mikebaggetta.com

name: Source Material - Mike Baggetta Quartet (CD)
description: Source Material - Mike Baggetta Quartet 2011 Fresh Sound New Talent (FSNT 388) Mike Baggetta, Guitar Jason Rigby, Saxophones Eivind Opsvik, Bass George Schuller, Drums Tracks: Tonic Nathan Liberty Momentum The Sky & The Sea The Winter Moon A Trust Issue Projections Camp In performing the award-winning compositions of its guitarist-leader, the Mike Baggetta Quartet displays an intense focus on group interaction, fearless improvisation and a too-seldom-heard patience in their interpretation of each song. “Source Material” follows up the group’s debut album on Fresh Sound New Talent, “Small Spaces,” with a deeper view into Baggetta’s compositional aesthetic. From the playfully teetering “Projections,” to the somber ballad “Nathan,” to the night sky tone poem “Camp,” each song seems to create an unheard-before mood. All players are featured interacting throughout with Schuller’s drums starting off the album on “Tonic.” Baggetta’s electric guitar is featured on the uptempo “Momentum,” while his acoustic playing is showcased on the Ralph Towner-esque solo piece “The Winter Moon.” “The Sky & The Sea” features a beautiful solo bass introduction by Opsvik. This is truly new music full of original voices and beautiful heartfelt performances. To sample tracks, visit: http://www.mikebaggetta.com

name: Canto - Mike Baggetta (CD)
description: Mike Baggetta, Solo Prepared Guitar 2010 MabnotesMusic (MMCD001) Tracks: i ii iii iv v vi vii viii ix Canto is Mike Baggetta’s seminal album of prepared guitar etudes. Originally released in 2002 on the now defunct Optical Sounds label, this new reissue features an impressive remastering of the audio by engineer Jon Rosenberg as well as a completely redesigned package, including Baggetta’s new liner notes about the project. The reissue of this important work is also the first release on the new label, MabnotesMusic. The music on this album captures the nuance and subtlety of tone that has become part of Baggetta's musical trademark, establishing him as one of his generation's most thoughtful and adventurous improvisors. The nine etudes included on Canto explore the inherent flexibility of the prepared guitar, its productive sounds and their application as melodic material. Testing the boundaries of form and aesthetics, Baggetta delivers a powerful musical statement that is sure to delight and challenge his listeners. To sample tracks, visit: http://www.mikebaggetta.com
